effect.sun-moon: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: If the user has a major status effect and the target does not, the user’s status is transferred to the target.

short_effect.sun-moon: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Transfers the user’s major status effect to the target.

flavor_text.sun-moon: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.
